1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__21.5__The number: The difference of the numbers here and 2 Kings 24. is to be accounted for, by supposing the greater number to be that which was really found, and the lesser to be that which Joab gave in.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__21.12__Three years famine: Which joined with the three foregoing years of famine mentioned, 2 Kings 21. and the seventh year of the land's resting, would make up the seven years proposed by the prophet, 2 Kings 24. 13.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__21.25__Six hundred sicles: This was the price of the whole place, on which the temple was afterwards built; but the price of the oxen was fifty sicles of silver. 2 Kings 24. 24.
